description:
I’ll start by saying that I voted for Obama twice. I believed in him and what he stood for. It’s a hard thing... to believe in something. To believe in somebody. To hold an ideal in your mind about how the world is and have it crash down. To be lied to. It’s hard. .
.

But just because it’s hard doesn’t mean that we shouldn’t know it. All American’s deserve to know the truth. We have all been duped no matter what side of the political spectrum you are on. .
.
Many of us have prayed for this information to come out for years now and more is exposed each day. .
.

Let’s do our best to be nice to each other and stand together as Americans and not be angry at each other, but rather be angry at the people who have abused their power and lied to our country. We have all been lied to for way to long. .
.
It’s time we take our country back. ✊🏻🇺🇸🙏🏻 #obamagate
#thegreatawakening 
#wwgw1wga
